adjective.description: Relating to or denoting the region of the sea or seabed relatively close to a shore.
examples: volunteers monitor humpback whales in nearshore waters
corals are essential to the nearshore ecosystem

adjective.description: Relating to the transfer of a business operation to a nearby country.
examples: we set up a nearshore operation in Poland

verb.description: (of a company) transfer (a business operation) to a nearby country, especially in preference to a more distant location.
examples: many capital market firms are starting to nearshore their operations
